sense.name: 法律, law,
sense.commentary: Arule made by a government that states how people may and may not behave in society and in business, and that oftern orders particular punishments if they do not obey, or a system of such rules.
sense.examples:
律师事务所 law office
法律冲突 conflict of law
法律范围 scope of law

sense.name: 法律, legal,
sense.commentary: The fact or state of being allowed by law or connected with law.
sense.examples:
法律代理人 legal agent
法律服务 legal services
法律关系 legal relation
